subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Chris Greisen threw seven touchdown passes and ran for another to help the Georgia Force defeat the Philadelphia Soul, 65-39, last night in the Arena League playoffs. The Force (15-2) will play host to the Columbus Destroyers for the National Conference championship Saturday.Troy Bergeron took the opening kickoff 56 yards for a touchdown. Greisen passed for 301 yards, and Chris Jackson had 10 receptions for 169 yards and scored four second-half touchdowns.
